posts.post_title: Soverign 460 and  an Apple Green for sale
posts.post_content:
I'm not really sure what to ask for these at this time so I figured I would put them up and hopefully get a few offers. PM or feel free to email me at [url]maxjacks89@yahoo.com[/url]. I'm also looking for a Mathewson White cap let me know if you have one you are looking to move
